subject: Re: [junit] Junit-add-ons to test private methods.
msgSnippet: If you need to test private methods then they should not be private.  In my testing I have not found any real good excuse to test a private method. Ty ...
messageBody:
If you need to test private methods then they should
not be private. In my testing I have not found any
real good excuse to test a private method.

Ty

--- meera.ramachandran@... wrote:
> Please let me know how to test Private methods in
> Junit using Junit
> add-ons?
>
>
>
>
>
> Regards,
>
> Meera Ramachandran
